msbt.message: Did you hear?<10_4 /> got whatever bug is going around . I'm sure a visit from you would be much appreciated.
Oh manApparently is as sick as right now.I know I feel better when a friend visits, so maybe you should think about stopping by.
Hey, so I just found out that isn't feeling too well right now. This seems like the perfect time for you to pull out any medicine you've been saving up for a rainy day
